Class AdminSession

java.lang.Object
  sessiondvd.StandardSession
      sessiondvd.AdminSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
pSession, sSession
 class AdminSession
extends StandardSession
implements pSession

Class provides access to privileged commands through pSession interface.
